grahampaige.comment: And after considering all comments from this evening's meeting, including those made by Dr. Acuff during his presentation about how we can use these funds effectively with some flexibility given us through ARPA money, but also being mindful of what Mr. Oberg said earlier tonight regarding not wanting to spend more than necessary because there may come other needs down the road where we would like to apply any remaining monies towards them if they're available at such time when needed most urgently now rather than later potentially having less resources left over due to overspending currently without knowing exactly which future expenses might arise unexpectedly requiring immediate action then instead taking care today so tomorrow has better opportunities too since saving up could lead into even greater benefits further ahead once again proving why planning matters greatly especially financially speaking here locally within Albemarle County Public Schools
